      <option value=41>18Pa (+41%)</option>

      <option value=47>20Pa (+47%)</option>
      <option value=50>21Pa (+50%)</option>
      <option value=53>22Pa (+53%)</option>

      <option value=56>23Pa (+56%)</option>

      <option value=62>25Pa (+62%)</option>
      <option value=65>26Pa (+65%)</option>
      <option value=68>27Pa (+68%)</option>

      <option value=77>30Pa (+77%)</option>
      <option value=80>31Pa (+80%)</option>

      <option value=89>34Pa (+89%)</option>

      <option value=98>37Pa (+98%)</option>
         </select>
       <input id="BoutonGrisI" name="Soigner" value="Se Soigner" type="submit">
   </td>
</tr>
<tr>

   <td class="pourcentage" align="center">
       Gain:<input type="text" name="indi_s" readonly="readonly"
value="0">pv(s)
       <input name="bases" type="hidden" value="0">
       <input name="gainpva" type="hidden" value="0">
   </td>
   <td class="pourcentage" align="right">
   <font style="font-size:8px">

type="text" name="indi_sp" readonly="readonly" value="0">%)
   </font>

   </td>
</tr>
</form>
</table>
      </td>
   <td id="box_noir_Right" height="100%">&nbsp;</td>

     </div>
